metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9488 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper validation of certificate with host mismatch in Apache Log4j SMTP appender. This could allow an SMTPS connection to be intercepted by a man-in-the-middle attack which could leak any log messages sent through that appender. Fixed in Apache Log4j 2.12.3 and 2.13.1

criterions.comment: apache-log4j2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
